info.title: Presenty GPT API
info.description: This contains endpoints exposed by api.presenty.app for GPT

post.description: Save endpoint, it Saves markdown content and chunked DALL.E images by taking Step 2 generated markdown content and DALL-E images and outputs presentationUrl and presentationId
post.summary: Save endpoint, it Saves markdown content and chunked DALL.E images by taking Step 2 generated markdown content and DALL-E images and outputs presentationUrl and presentationId

markdownContent.description: GPT Step 2 generated markdown content that adheres to syntax used in markdowncontent.txt

presentationName.description: Presentation name, based on user topic

presentationId.description: Optional presentation Id. Required only when updating existing content.

dalleImages.description: Array of Dall.E generated images. Each image is processed using the following steps and then used as a value in dalleImages: Step 1: Dall.E image is converted to a JPEG format with a resolution of 720px; Step 2: The JPEG image is then converted into a base64 encoded string; Step 3: This base64 string is split or chunked into a sequence of string array, with each chunk containing 200 or less characters, Note: api.presenty.app server will combine string array get full base64 string representing jpeg Dall.E generated image.

fileNameWithExtension.description: GUID Filename of Dall.E generated image, including .jpeg extension, value should be same as used in markdown content in step 2.

base64Chunks.description: Array of chunked (split) base64 encoded strings, each chunk string is max of 200 or less characters

presentationUrl.description: URL of the generated presentation. This URL points to the location where the presentation is accessible.

presentationId.description: Unique identifier for the generated presentation. This ID can be used to reference or retrieve the presentation at a later time.
